===Silicon Laboratories===
;[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/zigbee ZigBee Products] • [[ZigBee]] • [[Bluetooth devices]] *'''EFR32BG''' - Blue Gecko Bluetooth Low Energy SoC (MCU, ARM Cortex-M4) *''' EFR32MG21''' - Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking WiSoC for ZigBee/Thread (ARM Cortex-M33) :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/series-2-efr32-mighty-gecko-zigbee-thread-soc EFR32MG21] (ARM Cortex-M33), 1024KB Flash, 96KB RAM, 20 GPIO, No USB, B/T/Z *'''EFR32MG12''' - Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking WiSoC for ZigBee/Thread (MCU, ARM Cortex-M4) :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/efr32mg-mighty-gecko-zigbee-thread-soc EFR32MG] (ARM Cortex-M4), 256-1024KB Flash, 32-256KB RAM, 16-65 GPIO, No USB, B/T/Z *'''EM3581''' - Network Co-Processor for ZigBee/Thread WiSoC (32-bit MCU, ARM Cortex-M3) *'''EM3587''' - Network Co-Processor for ZigBee/Thread WiSoC (32-bit MCU, ARM Cortex-M3) :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/em358x-em359x-zigbee-thread-soc EM358x] (ARM Cortex-M3), 256-512KB Flash, 32-64KB RAM, 24 GPIO, Yes USB, T/Z :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/em358x-em359x-zigbee-thread-soc EM359x] (ARM Cortex-M3), 256-512KB Flash, 32-64KB RAM, 32 GPIO, Yes USB, T/Z *'''EM357''' - Mesh Networking WiSoC for ZigBee/802.15.4 (MCU, ARM Cortex-M3) :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/em35x-zigbee-thread-soc-ncp EM35x] (ARM Cortex-M3), 128-196KB Flash, 12KB RAM, 24 GPIO, No USB, Z :[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/em34x EM34x] (ARM Cortex-M3), 128-196KB Flash, 12KB RAM, 24 GPIO, No USB, Z :B - Bluetooth protocol, T - Thread protocol, Z - ZigBee protocol
;[https://www.silabs.com/products/wireless/mesh-networking/z-wave/modules Z-Wave Modules] *'''EFR32ZG14''' - Z-Wave 700 Modem SoC, 256KB Flash, 32KB RAM, QFN32 *'''ZGM130S''' - Z-Wave 700 SiP Module, 512KB Flash, 64KB RAM, LGA64 *'''ZM5101''' - Z-Wave 500 SiP Module, 128KB Flash, 16KB RAM, 8 x 8 mm *'''ZM5202''' - Z-Wave 500 Module, SD3502, 128KB Flash, 16KB RAM, 12.5 x 13.6 x 1.8 mm *'''ZM5304''' - Z-Wave 500 Serial Module, SD3503, N/A, N/A, 27 x 15.2 x 5.5 mm
:[[Samsung SmartThings Hub v2 (STH-ETH-250)]] :Bluetooth LE SoC (2.4GHz) - [[Nordic Semiconductor]] nRF51822-QFAC :Z-Wave SoC (ZM5304-U Module) - [[Sigma Designs]] SD3503A-CNE3 :ZigBee SoC (32-Bit ARM Cortex-M3) - [[Silicon Labs]] EM3587-RTR :ZigBee PA (2.4GHz, int. LNA/TR Switch) - [[Skyworks]] SE2432L
;VoIP, xDSL, ONT :'''Si3011/Si3019''' - Line-Side Device (VoIP) :'''Si3050''' - VoIP Chip with SPI Interface :'''Si3101/Si3201''' - Line-Side Device (VoIP) :'''Si3210''' - Programable CMOS SLIC/Codec Chip :'''Si3215''' - Programmable CMOS SLIC/Codec Chip :'''Si3216''' - Programmble Wideband SLIC/Codec Chip :'''Si32175''' - ProSLIC Single Chip (FXS/VoIP) :'''Si32178''' - VoIP ProSLIC/Codec Chip (FXS/FXO) :'''Si32260''' - Dual ProSLIC Single Chip (FXS) :'''Si32919''' - VoIP ProSLIC Single Chip (FXS) :'''Si3402''' - IEEE 802.3-Compliant PoE PD Interface :'''Si4126''' - 2.4GHz RF Synthesizer with Integrated VCO :'''SL38000''' - 4-PLL Clock Generator with SSC
;USB, UART, LED :'''CP2102''' - USB to UART Bridge Controller :'''CP2104''' - Single-Chip USB to UART Bridge :'''CP2109''' - USB to UART Bridge Controller :'''CP2401''' - 128/64 Segment LCD Driver (Watch)
;MCU, RFIC, FEM :''C8051 T634'' - 8-bit 25MHz Microcontroller (MCU) :''IA3223A/IA3222B'' - POTS/PSTN (DAA) Chip :''FTDI'' FT232R - USB to Serial UART
'''{{See also|CSR|Skyworks|Sigma Designs|ZigBee}}''' :Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR) • [[QCA]] • Skyworks (SiGe) :''[[CSR]] ([[Qualcomm]])'' CSR8811 - Bluetooth 4.1 SoC :''[[Skyworks]] (SiGe)'' SE2432L - 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Energy FEM :''[[Sigma Designs]]'' SD3503A - Z-Wave SoC (ZM5304-U Module) :''[[Sigma Designs]]'' ZM5101 - Z-Wave SoC/Transciever
